title: Add app-ads.txt to frontend public folder for Google AdMob verification

requirements.text: Create the file `frontend/public/app-ads.txt` with the content `google.com, pub-7936595519986908, DIRECT, f08c47fec0942fa0` so that it is served at the root URL path (e.g., `https://mucitevreni-iii.caffeine.xyz/app-ads.txt`) and accessible to Google AdMob for publisher verification.

quotes: benim için app-ads.txt uzantısını hazırla normal uygulamanın URL sinin uzantısına

acceptanceCriteria: The file `frontend/public/app-ads.txt` exists in the project.
The file contains exactly one line: `google.com, pub-7936595519986908, DIRECT, f08c47fec0942fa0`
The file is accessible at `https://mucitevreni-iii.caffeine.xyz/app-ads.txt` after deployment.
No other files are modified as part of this change.

constraints: Do not modify any backend files.
Do not modify any existing frontend source files.
The app-ads.txt file must be placed in `frontend/public/` so it is served as a static asset at the root path.
nonGoals: Adding any UI element or indicator related to app-ads.txt.
Modifying AdMob configuration or publisher ID.
